ud6.10:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud6.10:1.3: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi.
ud6.10:1.4: Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud6.10:2.1: “Yavakivanca, bhante, tathagata loke nuppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha tava annatitthiya paribbajaka sakkata honti garukata manita pujita apacita labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud6.10:2.2: Yato ca kho, bhante, tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha atha annatitthiya paribbajaka asakkata honti agarukata amanita apujita anapacita na labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud6.10:2.3: Bhagavayeva dani, bhante, sakkato hoti garukato manito pujito apacito labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam, bhikkhusangho ca”ti.
ud6.10:3.1: “Evametam, ananda, yavakivanca, ananda, tathagata loke nuppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha tava annatitthiya paribbajaka sakkata honti garukata manita pujita apacita labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud6.10:3.2: Yato ca kho, ananda, tathagata loke uppajjanti arahanto sammasambuddha atha annatitthiya paribbajaka asakkata honti agarukata amanita apujita anapacita na labhino civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
ud6.10:3.3: Tathagatova dani sakkato hoti garukato manito pujito apacito labhi civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam, bhikkhusangho ca”ti.
ud6.10:4.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
ud6.10:6.3: Na takkika sujjhanti na capi savaka,
